title: Resourcesat-1 AWIFS Standard Products
summary:
The coarse resolution multi-spectral sensor, AWIFS operates in four spectral bands - B2, B3, B4, B5 in visible near infrared (VNIR) and B5 in Short Wave Infrared 
(SWIR) providing data with 56m resolution. Standard products are full scene (path-row) based geo-referenced as well as geo-orthokit  products.
